mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gb.buyBasketData(userId, imgIdx, imgName, imgPoint, imgSubject, imgDetail, selling) VALUES (#{userId},#{imgIdx},#{imgName},#{imgPoint},#{imgSubject}, #{imgDetail}, #{selling})
mapper.select: select count(*) from gb.buyBasketData where userId=#{userId} and selling='n'
SELECT sum(imgPoint) FROM gb.buyBasketData WHERE userId=#{userId} AND selling='n'
select count(*) from gb.buyBasketData where userId=#{userId} and selling='y'
SELECT * FROM gb.buyBasketData WHERE userId=#{userId} and selling='n' ORDER BY buyidx DESC
SELECT * FROM gb.buyBasketData WHERE userId=#{userId} and selling='y' ORDER BY buyidx DESC
SELECT * FROM gb.buyBasketData WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM buyBasketData WHERE userId=#{userId} and imgIdx=#{userId})a
mapper.update: UPDATE gb.buyBasketData SET selling='y' WHERE userId=#{userId} and imgIdx=#{imgIdx}
UPDATE gb.buyBasketData SET selling='n' WHERE userId=#{userId} and imgIdx=#{imgIdx}
mapper.delete: delete from gb.buyBasketData where userId=#{userId} and imgIdx=#{imgIdx}
